issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
To re-create the bug, simply create a new Alloy Mobile project and replace the code below with the default code in index.xml.

 <Alloy>
        <TabGroup backgroundColor="white" tabsAtBottom="true" >
            <Tab id="tab1" title="Tab 1" icon="KS_nav_views.png">
                <Window id="win1" title="Tab 1">
                   <Label id="label1" color="#999">I am Window 1</Label>
                </Window>
            </Tab>
            <Tab id="tab2" title="Tab 2" icon="KS_nav_views.png">
                <Window id="win2" title="Tab 2">
                    <Label id="label2" color="#999">I am Window 2</Label>
                </Window>
            </Tab>
            <!-- Use the Require tag to include external Ti.UI.Tab views -->
        </TabGroup>
    </Alloy>
fields.summary: TabGroup TabsAtBottom doesn't work for Android
fields.environment:
Mac OSX
Appc SDK : 7.0.0
Studio : 5.0.0.201712081732
Android Simulator, OS version 7.1.1
